Package fr.uge.backpackhero.item

package fr.uge.backpackhero.item
  • Related Packages

  • Class
    Description
    Armor
    Represents a piece of armor that the hero can equip.
    Arrow
    Represents an arrow that can be fired by a ranged weapon.
    BackPack
    Represents the hero's backpack grid containing placed items.
    Curse
    Represents a curse item.
    Gold
    Represents a gold coin item.
    Item
    Represents a generic item that can be placed in the hero's backpack and optionally used in combat.
    ItemInstance
    Represents an instance of an Item in the backpack.
    MagicItem
    Represents a magical item that can be used in combat.
    Main
    Main entry point for testing the backpack and item system.
    ManaStone
    Represents a mana stone that can be used in combat.
    MeleeWeapon
    Represents a physical weapon designed for close-quarters combat.
    Position
    Represents a set of coordinates (row and column) used to locate items within the BackPack or to define the relative shape of an item.
    RangeWeapon
    Represents a ranged weapon used for attacking enemies from a distance.
    Rarity
    Represents the rarity level of an item, influencing its value, power, and appearance frequency in the game.
    Shield
    Represents a defensive item that provides protection during combat.
    Stuff
    Enumeration listing all known item types available for generation in the game.
    StuffFactory
    A factory class responsible for creating concrete Item objects based on a weighted rarity distribution and item type Stuff.
    View
    Console-based interaction class responsible for handling all user input and displaying the state of the BackPack and combat choices.
